description: The Innominata Pro is a new interpretation of one of their classic mid-layers. Versatile while outdoors or for everyday wear. Plush, warm and super comfortable. Polartec® High Loft teddy fleece keeps you warm on cold days. The superior quality material is both functional and durable. Two zippered slit pockets and a zippered chest pocket offer plenty of room for various items. Embrace your passion for the mountains. Every day.
name: Mammut Innominata Pro ML Jacket - Mens
